description: Green Studios (GS) is a landscape architecture and technology platform bringing vertical greenery in urban centers.

GreenPrint provides the world’s leading retail, fuel, fleet, and product brands with sustainability as a service solutions to increase consumer goodwill, sales and profitability, and create a net-positive impact on our environment.
Grey Group is a Digital Marketing Agency focused on Online Campaigns, Advergames, Social Networking, User Generated Content, Trendwatching and Creativity.
GridMarkets is a SaaS provider for visual effects, engineering and financial services.
Peixe is an e-commerce platform, which resulted from the merger in 2018 between Peixe Urbano (Brazil’s largest local e-commerce) and Groupon LatAm (the largest local e-commerce in Latin America).
Grupo Air is a holding company of firms specializing in dust control, delivering clean air solutions to mining and industrial clients.
Grupo ARS offers distressed asset management, debt collection, and call center services to financial institutions and corporations, with a focus on consumer debt.
Grupo Gastronomico operates 5 restaurant brands – Sport Café, La Perla del Pacífico, Puerto Bellavista, Puerto del Alto and Trattoria Rita
Ideagro designs and produces equipment used to help modernize the cattle farming industry in Colombia.

Meiko collects and analyses data on many small independent retailers across Latin America, and provides actionable insights to FMCG brands to allow them to optimize their distribution and sales strategies.
SOHIN provides patients and their families with a suite of integrated services that reduce stress and simplify the complexities of treating a chronic disease.
Guapaletas is an Argentine popsicle brand.
GuiaBolso is Brazil’s leading personal finance platform. It was acquired by PicPay in July 2021.
Guidepost’s network of diabetes coaches uses a telemedicine platform to reach, understand, advise, and support people with diabetes.
Gumindo Bogamanis processes and sells premium-quality sunflower seeds, building mutually beneficial business partnerships with customers and suppliers.
Gurucargo is a Digital Forwarder that does for cargo shipping in Brazil what Flexport is doing in USA. Gurucargo was acquired in 2019.
Hack The Box is an online platform enabling individuals, teams, businesses and students to test their penetration (hacking) skills and exchange ideas and methodologies.

Halan is Egypt’s first ride-hailing and delivery application, providing two and three-wheeler vehicle rides and on-demand logistics for individuals and businesses. With its wallet, bill payments services, e-commerce with BNPL, and micro loans, Halan is the leading Super App for the unconnected and unbanked in the region.
Handle is a marketplace to buy and sell high-quality excess healthcare inventory, supplies and equipment.
HappyFresh is Southeast Asia’s leading food-focused last mile logistics and on-demand delivery company. One of the Endeavor Entrepreneurs, Markus Bihler, is now co-founder of Builders Union.
